mainSequence.step: Visitor asks for the list of tricks.
UserInterface asks the Domain to execute the use-case.
Domain activates and receives the use-case request from UserInterface.
Domain fetches the tricks list from the database through Infrastructure.
Infrastructure fetches the tricks list and provides the result to Domain.
UserInterface presents the fetched list to the Visitor.
Domain deactivates after completing the request.
UserInterface renders the page with the tricks list to the Visitor.
